actionsandpool.resourcepool

Class ResourcePool<R extends Resource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • actionsandpool.resourcepool.ResourcePool<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - a Resource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasketPool, CubiclePool

    public abstract class ResourcePool<R extends Resource>
extends java.lang.Object
    ResourcePool is an administrator of Resource
